name: DYZMORPHIA
description:
Trailer: 

Thanks to Pallad1um for the awesome trailer!

This game was created in 6 days for the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3.

All music, code, and assets were made in this time. 

Special thanks to friends who helped play-testing.

Please give feedback if you can, and vote if you're playing during the ratings. Thanks!

I highly encourage speed-running this game! Post your time in the comments below!

Controls: 

W  = move up

A  = move left

D  = move right

S  = move down

R (hold) = reload

Left Click = Shoot

Right Click = Turbo Shoot

Space = Dash (when unlocked)
